title: "Bitcoin Trading Indicators"
output: html_notebook
---

Create Bitcoin indicators for trading.


Set options and load packages
```{r}
options(scipen = 999, digits = 4)

library(tidyverse)
library(tseries)
library(quantmod)
```



Load data
```{r}
btc_price <- read.csv("btc_usd.csv")
eth_price <- read.csv("eth_usd.csv")

```


Using Quantmod

```{r}
getSymbols("BTC-USD", from='2016-10-27', to='2021-10-27')

BTC <- na.omit(`BTC-USD`)


chartSeries(BTC,
            subset='2020-10::2021-10',
            theme=chartTheme('white')
            )
addSMA(n=3,on=1,col = "blue")
addSMA(n=15,on=1,col = "red")
```

```{r}
sma3 <- SMA(Cl(BTC))

tail(sma, 10)
```
